author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
TFS:11710609

PowerShell is [enabling VT mode ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/110878ca05836f85f7b676db681bca4d87a0747e/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.ConsoleHost/host/msh/ConsoleHostUserInterface.cs#L73) which then gets propagated to child processes that don't work correctly with that flag enabled.  Recommendation from conhost team is to reset the console mode to default before creating child processes (which is what cmd does).
title: On Windows, PowerShell is incorrectly propagating VT mode to child processes
